title: 111_s370
content: Guantanamo Bay Detention Facility Safe Closure Act of 2009 - Prohibits federal funds from being used to: (1) transfer any detainee at the Naval Station Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, to any facility in the United States or its territories. (2) construct or enhance any facility in the United States in order to house any such detainee. Or (3) house or otherwise incarcerate any such detainee in the United States or its territories.
